snippet.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines: Axle City Racers - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
On your marks, get ready to race with Blaze, Pickle, Crusher, and more Monster Machine friends! From Axle City to the Monster Dome, the world of Blaze is yours to explore. Race at blazing speed for the championship or play with up to 4-players in split-screen mode!

• BE BLAZE and 6 more heroes including Starla, Pickle, and Crusher
• RACE WITH FRIENDS in couch 4-player split-screen mode
• POWER UP with speed boosts, upgrades, and unique character abilities
• WIN THE CUP at the Axle City Grand Prix, the Monster Dome, and more
• AUTO DRIVE with optional simple controls for younger players

Follow us on:
Web: https://www.bandainamcoent.eu
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bandainamcoeu
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Bandainamcoeu 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bandainamcoeu
